To those in Southeast & Mid-Atlantic: please take #HurricaneFlorence seriously. If you're in the mandatory evacuation zone, it's so important that you follow local instructions to evacuate. Make sure your friends, family & neighbors are safe too. https://twitter.com/fema/status/1039881167225409537 QT @fema If you need to evacuate for Hurricane #Florence, today is your last day to go before the storm arrives. You can text SHELTER and your zip code (i.e. SHELTER 12345) to 4FEMA (43362) to locate an open emergency shelter near you. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dm5l-xGWwAEviyQ.jpg

RT @NormEisen Strongly disagree with @JudicialWatch. This is NOT an ethics violation. Under Senate Rule XXIX, a doc is only Committee Confidential if Chair & Ranking agree, if there was a vote or other trigger. No such thing happened here—indeed Feinstein objected. @CoryBooker acted ethically! https://twitter.com/judicialwatch/status/1039941296994050048 QT @JudicialWatch BREAKING: JW hand-delivered a letter to the chairman & co-chairman of the Senate Select Committee on Ethics calling for an investigation into Senator Cory Booker’s admitted violation Senate rules by releasing confidential records via social media. (1/4)
